description: The La Louisiane cocktail is a twist on the&nbsp;Vieux Carr√©, and it's just as potent. The only difference? In place of cognac, you'll find rye whiskey mixed with other ingredients to give this delightful drink its signature flavor profile!
name: A La Louisiane

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, Benedictine, absinthe, and Peychaud's bitters into a mixing glass. Add ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, Benedictine, absinthe, and Peychaud's bitters into a mixing glass. Add ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain it into a chilled coupe glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain it into a chilled coupe glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with the maraschino cherry. Serve and enjoy.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with the maraschino cherry. Serve and enjoy.
